name: Change of Seasons
description:
Time's passing by and you can try, but you won't catch it. You'll need to run and start working hard while you're feeling energetic.

Get as far as you can in this side scrolling, platforming ride of a lifetime. Drink from the fountains of youth to increase your time. Don't dawdle or you'll find yourself questioning why you can't do what you used to.

Default Controls

A D / Left and Right Arrows - Move Left and Right
Spacebar - Jump
S / Down Arrow - Slide Skill
E / Left Click - Sword Attack
Enter - Pause / Select
